1 // ~~~~~~~~ A page
  2 
  3 if (!capsule) {
  4     /** @namespace */
  5     capsule = {};
  6 }
  7 
  8 (function($, capsule){
  9 
 10 if(typeof console === "undefined") {
 11     console = { log: function() { } };
 12 }
 13 
 14 var Events = capsule.Events;
 15 
 16 /**
 17  * @class
 18  */
 19 capsule.Page = function(id, port, settings) {
 20     this.id = id;
 21     this.portal = port;
 22     this.options = $.extend({
 23         numberOfColumns: 3
 24     }, settings);
 25     var _this = this;
 26 
 27     // Add the tabs
 28     this.pageTab = $("<li></li>").addClass("pagetab")
 29         .append($("<a></a>")
 30             .attr("id", id)
 31             .attr("class", (this.portal.admin() ? "admin" : "user") + (this.options.locked ? " locked" : ""))
 32             .append(
 33                 $("<img></img>").attr("src", "/public/images/blank.png")
 34                     .addClass("pagelock")
 35                     .attr("width", 16)
 36                     .attr("height", 16)
 37             )
 38             .append($("<span></span>").addClass("tabName").text(this.name()))
 39             .append($("<span></span>").addClass("tabEditButton").html("✎")
 40                 .click(function(e){
 41                     e.stopPropagation();
 42                     _this.toggleEditPane();
 43                 })
 44             )
 45             .click(function(){
 46                 _this.select();
 47             })
 48         );
 49 
 50     $('.capsule-pages a#addPage').parent().before(this.pageTab);
 51     $('#' + this.id + " .pagelock").click(function(e){
 52         e.stopPropagation();
 53         $(this).parent().toggleClass('locked');
 54         this.portal.save();
 55     });
 56     var removePageLbl = this.portal.message("removePage");
 57     var closeLbl = this.portal.message("close");
 58     this.editPane = $("<div></div").addClass("capsule-editPane")
 59         .append($("<div></div>").addClass("capsule-paneInner")
 60             .append($("<input></input>").attr("type", "text").addClass("pageTitle"))
 61             .append($("<a></a>").attr("href", "#").addClass("pageRemove").text(removePageLbl))
 62             .append($("<a></a>").attr("href", "#").addClass("paneClose").text(closeLbl))
 63             .append($("<div></div>").addClass("pageLayoutSelector")
 64                 .append($("<span></span>").addClass("pageLayout1").text("1"))
 65                 .append($("<span></span>").addClass("pageLayout2").text("2"))
 66                 .append($("<span></span>").addClass("pageLayout3").text("3"))
 67             )
 68         );
 69     this.portal.content.append(
 70         $("<div></div>").attr("id", id + "_content").addClass("page")
 71             .append(this.editPane)
 72             .append($("<div></div")
 73                     .attr("class", "capsule-container column1")
 74                     .css("width", this.portal.sideWidth() + "%"))
 75             .append($("<div></div")
 76                     .attr("class", "capsule-container column2")
 77                     .css("width", this.portal.centerWidth() + "%"))
 78             .append($("<div></div")
 79                     .attr("class", "capsule-container column3")
 80                     .css("width", this.portal.sideWidth() + "%"))
 81     );
 82 
 83     // Create edit pane and add event handlers
 84     this._bindEditPane();
 85     this.portal.pages.push(this);
 86     this.portal.pagesById[id] = this;
 87 }
 88 
 89 Page.prototype = {
 90 
 91     id: null,
 92 
 93     name: function(value) {
 94         if (value) {
 95             if (typeof this.options.name == 'string') {
 96                 this.options.name = value;
 97             }
 98             if (typeof this.options.name == 'object' && this.options.name[this.portal.lang()]) {
 99                 this.options.name[this.portal.lang()] = value;
100             }
101             $(".tabName", this.pageTab).text(value);
102         }
103         if (typeof this.options && this.options.name) {
104             if (typeof this.options.name == 'string') {
105                 return this.options.name;
106             }
107             if (typeof this.options.name == 'object' && this.options.name[this.portal.lang()]) {
108                 return this.options.name[this.portal.lang()];
109             }
110         }
111         return 'noname';
112     },
113 
114     setColumnLayout: function(blnDoAnimation) {
115         // Set the column classes
116         var hideColumns = "";
117         var showColumns = "";
118         var removeClasses = "";
119         var addClasses = "";
120 
121         switch (this.options.numberOfColumns) {
122             case 1:
123                 hideColumns = ".column2,.column3";
124                 showColumns = ".column1";
125                 removeClasses = "twocolumn";
126                 addClasses = "onecolumn";
127                 break;
128 
129             case 2:
130                 hideColumns = ".column3";
131                 showColumns = ".column1,.column2";
132                 removeClasses = "onecolumn";
133                 addClasses = "twocolumn";
134                 break;
135 
136             case 3:
137                 hideColumns = "";
138                 showColumns = ".column1,.column2,.column3";
139                 removeClasses = "onecolumn twocolumn";
140                 addClasses = "";
141                 break;
142         }
143 
144         $(hideColumns).hide().removeClass(removeClasses);
145         blnDoAnimation = false; // TODO: Need to work on the animations
146         if( blnDoAnimation ){
147             // Need to compute the width because removing the class causes flash of original width
148             var newWidth = ( Math.floor( 100 / this.options.numberOfColumns ) - 2);
149             $( showColumns ).delay(200).show().animate({ "width": newWidth + "%"  }, "fast", function(){
150                 $(this).css("width","").removeClass( removeClasses ).addClass( addClasses );
151             });
152         } else {
153             $( showColumns ).show().removeClass( removeClasses ).addClass( addClasses );
154         }
155     },
156 
157     updateWidgetsForLayout: function(oldNumberOfColumns) {
158         if (oldNumberOfColumns === this.numberOfColumns) return;
159         if (oldNumberOfColumns < this.numberOfColumns) {
160             // Layout is bigger - trigger the event
161             Events.trigger(
162                 "Page_layoutChange_bigger",
163                 { columns: this.numberOfColumns, previous: oldNumberOfColumns }
164             );
165             return;
166         }
167 
168         // Create the column CSS selector for the columns that will be hidden
169         var columnsToMove = "";
170         for( var i = oldNumberOfColumns; i > this.numberOfColumns; i--){
171             columnsToMove += ".column" + i;
172             columnsToMove += i === this.numberOfColumns + 1 ? "" : ",";
173         }
174 
175         // Get the portlets that need to be moved
176         var movePortlets = $('#' + this.id + '_content')
177             .find( columnsToMove )
178             .find(".portlet");
179 
180         if (movePortlets.length === 0) return;
181 
182         // Move them...
183         movePortlets
184             .hide()
185             .each( function(){
186                 var $this = $(this);
187                 var originalColumn = $this.parent(".capsule-container").index();
188                 if( ! $this.data("originalColumn") ){
189                     $(this).data("originalColumn", originalColumn);
190                 }
191             })
192             .appendTo( '#' + this.id + '_content .column' + this.numberOfColumns )
193             .slideDown();
194 
195         this.listenForLayoutUndo( movePortlets );
196     },
197 
198     // Move portlets back to original positions if the user selects a larger layout.
199     listenForLayoutUndo: function (movePortlets) {
200 
201         // Events we will handle for layout changes
202         var namespace = ".updateWidgetsForLayout";  // Namespaced to this method
203         var biggerEvent = "Page_layoutChange_bigger" + namespace;
204         var closeEvent = "EditPane_close" + namespace;
205         var widgetDraggedEvent = "Portlet_dragdrop_stop.layoutChange" + namespace;
206 
207         // Unbind all layout events
208         var unbindLayoutEvents = function(){
209             Events.unbind( biggerEvent );
210             Events.unbind( closeEvent );
211             Events.unbind( widgetDraggedEvent );
212         };
213 
214         // Make sure we don't double bind if they go smaller twice.
215         unbindLayoutEvents();
216 
217         var pageId = this.id;
218         // Move portlets back to original spots when layout is bigger
219         Events.bind( biggerEvent, function( e, data ){
220             movePortlets.each(function(){
221                 var originalColumn = $(this).data("originalColumn");
222                 var newColumn = data.columns < originalColumn ? data.columns : originalColumn;
223                 $(this).appendTo( '#' + pageId + '_content .column' + newColumn );
224             });
225         });
226 
227         // Close event means it's safe to forget about changes.
228         Events.bind( closeEvent, function(){
229             movePortlets.removeData("originalColumn");
230             unbindLayoutEvents();
231         });
232 
233         // User updated a portlet position.
234         Events.bind( widgetDraggedEvent, function(e,data){
235             var portlet = $("#" + data.portlet.id);
236             var newColumn = portlet.parent(".capsule-container").index();
237             portlet.data("originalColumn", newColumn);
238         });
239     },
240 
241     _bindEditPane: function() {
242         // Page title handlers
243         var page = this;
244         this.editPane.find(".pageTitle")
245             .val(page.name())
246             .keyup(function(){
247                 var newName = $(this).val();
248                 page.options.name[i18n.lang] = newName;
249                 $("#" + page.id + " .tabName").text(newName);
250             })
251             .blur(function(){
252                 page.onStateChange();
253             });
254 
255         // Delete page handlers
256         this.editPane.find(".pageRemove")
257             .data('pageId', page.id)
258             .click( function(){
259                 if(confirm(page.portal.options.messages.removePageConfirm)){
260                     page.removePage();
261                 }
262             });
263 
264         // Close edit pane handlers
265         this.editPane.find(".paneClose")
266             .click( function(){
267                 page.toggleEditPane();
268             });
269     },
270 
271     _bindLayoutSelector: function(){
272         var pane = this.pane;
273         var page = this.page;
274 
275         // Page layout selector
276         pane.find(".pageLayoutSelector")
277             .bind("click", function(e){
278                 var target = $(e.target);
279                 if(target.hasClass("selected") || target.hasClass("pageLayoutSelector")){
280                     return;
281                 }
282 
283                 // Remove the old selection and get it's index
284                 var oldNumberOfColumns = $(this).find("span.selected").removeClass("selected").index() + 1;
285 
286                 target.addClass("selected");
287                 page.numberOfColumns = target.index() + 1;
288                 page.updateWidgetsForLayout( oldNumberOfColumns );
289                 page.setColumnLayout( true );
290                 page.onStateChange();
291             })
292             .find("span:eq(" + (page.numberOfColumns - 1) + ")")
293             .addClass("selected");
294     },
295 
296     select: function() {
297         var page = this;
298         $('.capsule-editPane:visible').each(function(){
299             page.toggleEditPane();
300         });
301 
302         $('.page').removeClass('selected').hide();
303         var $tabLink = $('#' + this.id);
304 
305         this.setColumnLayout();
306 
307         $('#' + this.id + '_content').addClass('selected').show();
308         $('.capsule-pages > li').removeClass('selected');
309         $tabLink.parent("li").addClass('selected');
310         var self = this;
311         $('#' + this.id + '_content .capsule-portlet').each(function() {
312             if(this.id) {
313                 var portlet = self.portal.portletsById[this.id];
314                 if(!portlet.initialized) {
315                     portlet.init();
316                 }
317             }
318         });
319     },
320 
321     toggleEditPane: function() {
322         var paneEvent = "EditPane_" + ( this.editPane.is( ":visible" ) ? "close" : "open" );
323         capsule.Events.trigger(paneEvent, { pageId: this.id });
324         this.editPane.toggle();
325     },
326 
327     removePage: function(){
328         $('#' + this.id + '_content').remove(); // Remove page
329         $('.capsule-pages>li #' + this.id).parent().remove(); // Remove tab
330         if (this.portal.pages.length > 0)
331             this.portal.pages[0].select();
332         this.onStateChange();
333     },
334 
335     addPortlet: function(id, settings) {
336         var portlet = new capsule.Portlet(id, this, settings);
337         this.portal.portlets.push(portlet);
338         this.portal.portletsById[id] = portlet;
339         return portlet;
340     },
341 
342     onStateChange: function(){
343         Events.trigger("Page_stateChange", { id: this.id });
344     }
345 };
346 
347 })(jQuery, capsule);
348
